This test checks that an outline change is correctly repainted.

There should be a 5px green outline below.

Lorem Ipsum
(GraphicsLayer
  (bounds 800.00 600.00)
  (children 1
    (GraphicsLayer
      (bounds 800.00 600.00)
      (contentsOpaque 1)
      (drawsContent 1)
      (repaint rects
        (rect 48.00 102.00 85.00 18.00)
        (rect 48.00 102.00 85.00 18.00)
        (rect 43.00 97.00 95.00 28.00)
      )
    )
  )
)
